about_the_game:
YOU ARE WHAT YOU EAT

In UDLR, your four directions of movement correspond with four different inventory slots: Up, Down, Left, and Right. Pick up an item on your left side, and now that item's ability will be used every time you move left! This simple premise is explored in depth, with many items and mechanical surprises to discover.

FEATURES

  • 90+ puzzles with a wide range of difficulty

    • Bespoke art for every puzzle

    • Language-agnostic hints for every puzzle

  • Level editor

  • Colorblind accessible by default

WHAT ABOUT UDLR_MODIFY?

UDLR_Modify was originally created for the Acerola Jam 0 as a prototype with 20 puzzles, where it was among the most popular games submitted. UDLR is the full-length follow up to that game, keeping the best puzzles from the original while adding many more, adding new item types, and modifying some of the base mechanics.

name: UDLR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, any x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support

short_description: A sokoban puzzle game where your four directions of movement are also inventory slots.
